summary:
Steph can be found in the Bee and Barb in Riften.
<br /><br />She knows Call of Valor and Disarm, will work on more shouts for her soon.
descriptionHtml:
Steph knows Disarm and Call of Valor, she also has Telekinesis.
<br />- Misc Details -
<br />She is Sister to alvor, so if you attack him; She will end you! Just a heads up, as she is powerful!
<br />She caps at lvl 100 and prefers One Handed Weapons.
<br />Once again, found at the Bee and Barb.
author: OGMSCOLEPEARSON
